nodes.text: This individual was an associate of the scout Marka Durn. When Durn tried to extort the pirate Xishel for more credits, the scout was shot by a Wookiee pirate and fled from the encounter. Durn encountered his associate, confiding the location of some treasure, just before dying.
This individual is the player-character in the adventure The Treasure of Celis Mott, published in 1996.
